column1: The Pit Room////I ordered the three meat platter that comes with two sides. I tried the brisket
column3: and beef sausage along with the coleslaw and beans. Since we were there at slow time of day
column4: the chef himself was out of the kitchen and instead making friendly small talk and offering his advice on what to order. This was a nice touch which I appreciated especially compared to some of the older BBQ establishments in Houston which make me feel a bit like cattle.
